entry.title: MarcusMQF/ChatCraft: ChatCraft is a lightweight, user-friendly chatbot interface designed to showcase the power of Superflex for frontend development and Ollama for running efficient, open-source AI models locally. Whether you're building a simple conversational agent or exploring AI-powered interfaces, ChatCraft provides a seamless and modern experience.
entry.content: ChatCraft is a lightweight, user-friendly chatbot interface designed to showcase the power of Superflex for frontend development and Ollama for running efficient, open-source AI models locally. Whether you're building a simple conversational agent or exploring AI-powered interfaces, ChatCraft provides a seamless and modern experience.

entry.title: dk8moore/teensy-pins-helper: A lightweight, browser-based tool that helps developers quickly visualize and configure pins for Teensy microcontroller projects. This tool simplifies the process of pin selection and peripheral assignment while automatically detecting potential conflicts.
entry.content: A lightweight, browser-based tool that helps developers quickly visualize and configure pins for Teensy microcontroller projects. This tool simplifies the process of pin selection and peripheral assignment while automatically detecting potential conflicts.

entry.title: coderxsa/simple-tm-bot: A lightweight, easy-to-use bot created by CoderX from South Africa. It automates tasks in the Termux environment, making it perfect for both beginners and advanced users. Simplify command execution and streamline your workflow with this customizable tool.

entry.title: flipzoom/PageHitCounter: The Page Hit Counter module for ProcessWire implements a simple page view tracking. Page views of visitors are automatically tracked on defined templates, with monitoring of multiple page views. Even if the page is cached. Also works with ProCache and AdBlockers. With a lightweight tracking code of ~320 bytes (gzipped).
entry.content: The Page Hit Counter module for ProcessWire implements a simple page view tracking. Page views of visitors are automatically tracked on defined templates, with monitoring of multiple page views. Even if the page is cached. Also works with ProCache and AdBlockers. With a lightweight tracking code of ~320 bytes (gzipped).
